name: Sustainable City
description:
Please check the computer's resolution. This game supports 1920X1080 and up.

In this game, you can experience how early cities developed, with an emphasis more on economic growth than on environmental protection. However, in the course of the game, the city will experience devasting cases of pollution and climate change, and players will have to solve these problems while maintaining economic success.

There are three outcomes: two losses and one win.

Please enjoy the game, and let's make our Earth green!
